data.text: @healthdpt @nidirect @niexecutive @publichealthni @HSCBoard This is a farce now .face coverings donnot help in anyway and there is plenty of Data to show this .It shows that those who should know about health Don't! And in fact are motivated by greed .

@AnnaInFermanagh @healthdpt @nidirect @niexecutive @publichealthni @HSCBoard Muzzles are no more than a fashion accessory worn by attention seekers who like to look the part they are as useful as a chocolate fireguard

@ebronite @healthdpt @nidirect @niexecutive @publichealthni @HSCBoard The ‘health department’ publish slogans not evidence to support their policies.
Been this way for 2 years.

@grillin_ni @healthdpt @nidirect @niexecutive @publichealthni @HSCBoard For the @healthdpt to call this scientific evidence is stretching the meaning of the word evidence to (or perhaps beyond) its zenith.

@grillin_ni @healthdpt @nidirect @niexecutive @publichealthni @HSCBoard I’ve spent a long time reading today looking for a published scientific study. All I have managed to find within the government’s published information are guesstimates from Spi-b which to be fair to them admits that they have no scientific studies on which to base advice. https://t.co/804UPqPNOT
@ebronite @healthdpt @nidirect @niexecutive @publichealthni @HSCBoard And the evidence that is keeping our children in masks in schools too ! Despite the rest of the uk dropping them

@healthdpt @nidirect @niexecutive @publichealthni @HSCBoard Can the @healthdpt please publish the scientific studies that prove efficacy of cloth face coverings this advice is based on please. You will understand that many of the public no longer trust the utterances of the Health minister after the revelations in the Spotlight program
